name: Dark Fright Demo
description:
I created Dark Fright for the 8 Bits to Infinity Game Jam and the theme for the game was "Darkness".

Dark Fright was created using Clickteam Fusion 2.5 and extra tools I used were Tiled and Pyxel Edit.

I've learned quite a lot working on this short demo and adding more levels and traps.

Controls are:

  • Shift: Jump
  • Ctrl: Light Torches (Lighter is needed)
  • Spacebar: Toggle Flashlight

Use Ctrl+Y to change controls or use a gamepad.

Please leave any comments and ideas for me to add to help me make a more full fledged game.
